s_synopsis: In the grand tradition of "R.B.I. Baseball" and "R.B.I. BASEBALL 2" comes the most spectacular ball game ever, "R.B.I. Baseball 3"! Just look at some of its fantastic features: All 26 pro teams, each with a roster of 24 real players! Actual 1990 stats for each player! Actual stats for Division Champions from '83 to '89! Instant Replay so you can relive the exciting plays during a game! Plus awesome animation, graphics, music, sound effects, and super realistic gameplay and rules! You're really playing in the big leagues now! "R.B.I. Baseball 3". It's the best baseball game you'll ever play!
